en:
软硬体
(Ruǎn yìng tǐ)

Hardware and software

Translations of 软硬体
[ 简体中文 -> English ]

软硬体
    Hardware and software, Software and hardware, Hardware or software, The software and hardware, Of hardware and software
ja:
软硬体
(Ruǎn yìng tǐ)

ハードウェアとソフトウェア
(Hādou~ea to sofutō~ea)

Translations of 软硬体
[ 简体中文 -> 日本語 ]

软硬体
